net.grinder.engine.process
Class ExternalLogger

java.lang.Object
  net.grinder.engine.process.ExternalLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger
final class ExternalLogger
extends Object
implements Logger

Logger implementation for external consumption. Delegates to the appropriate LoggerImplementation depending on whether it is called from the process thread or a worker thread.

This effectively makes ExternalLogger thread safe unless the script creates its own threads.

Author:
Philip Aston
